main event: Two luminous white objects were observed in the night sky south of Portland, Oregon.
interesting points: The objects were described as round but flat on top and bottom,The size of the objects was estimated to be that of a half dollar at arm's length,The objects changed positions and elevations during the sighting,The observation lasted for approximately 45 seconds,The objects were visible despite bright moonlight.
witness description: Civilian, Mr. ______, age 45, railroad representative, estimated reliable observer
